attributes.action: Respect the wishes of the House of Commons for a fully elected House of Lords, continue its reform until it is a fully elected chamber and to elect its members using the single transferable vote (STV)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 7th of March the Commons voted by a majority of 113 for a fully elected House of Lords. The government should respect its wishes and make the Lords fully elected. It should also elect its members by a STV system, which produces a broadly proportional result while overcoming the shortcomings of party list and hybrid systems.
